factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

scriptLines: query: '\n\nselect CustomerID, FirstName,LastName,Country,Score from [dbo].[Customers] where LastName IS NOT NULL',
query: '\nselect EmployeeID,FirstName, ISNULL(LastName,\'n/a\')as LastName,Department,Gender,Salary,ISNULL(ManagerID,1) as ManagerID, BirthDate from [dbo].[Employees]',
